articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Elden Ring: Nightreign is an epic RPG squeezed into delicious bite-size capsules - Ars Technica
articles.description: Fast-paced multiplayer action fits surprisingly well with the old Elden Ring formula.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Anthropic launches a voice mode for Claude - TechCrunch
articles.description: Anthropic has begun to roll out a "voice mode" for its Claude chatbot apps.
articles.content:
Anthropic has begun to roll out a “voice mode” for its Claude chatbot apps.
The voice mode (in beta for now) allows Claude mobile app users to have “complete spoken conversations with Claude,” and w… [+2241 chars]
